title-group.article-title: SEUL COMME BENVENISTE ou COMMENT LA CRITIQUE MANQUE DE STYLE

abstract.p: Benveniste is famous but misread. His style, his manner, the specific rhythm of his discourse are not perceived with all their critical dimension. For example, the philological point of view chosen by C. Dalimier to prove that « platonician » definition of rhythm does exist before Plato, despite Benveniste, overlooks the essential of what he actually says. Stylistics has to be critical or not to be.
